description:
The following commit 1c6cc18 removed the the populate_security_groups() method in nova/compute/api.py
 which causes nova-api to check against the database instead of quantum if a security group exists or not.
title: quantum security_group driver queries db regression

    quantum security_group driver queries db regression
    
    The following commit 1c6cc18 removed the populate_security_groups()
    method in nova/compute/api.py which causes nova-api to check against the
    database if a security group exists.
    
    Fixes bug 1145426
